bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A corporation may make a maximum of 2 applications for refunds under this regulation, provided that

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: each application is made on or after April 1, 2021 and before April 1, 2022, and
only one application is made on or before September 30, 2021.

change.changenote: Section 8 (1) and (2) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 286/2021, effective April 1, 2021 [retro from November 22, 2021].

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: Section 2 (1) does not apply to tax paid in relation to an eligible investment that is tangible personal property delivered on or after October 1, 2021, unless

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the corporation paid the tax in full on or before September 30, 2021, and
a written contract specified that the eligible investment would be delivered on or before November 30, 2021.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: Section 2 (1) does not apply to tax paid in relation to an eligible investment that is software incapable of being used before October 1, 2021, unless

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the corporation paid the tax in full on or before September 30, 2021, and
a written contract specified that the eligible investment would be delivered on or before November 30, 2021.
